name: AR Glass Breaker
description:
Play this awesome game and feel the games. See the Game and Graphics in real world.
Use your Rear Camera to play the game. Shoot with gun and ball. Break the glass, Play all 50 levels and Compete the game. Take help or air Strike the glass. If you get stuck just use it. Rate it and make it.

• Argument Reality.
• Play the game in real world.
• Unlock all 50 levels with Ball and Gun.
• Shoot Glasses with Gun and Bullets in Real Life.
• Get in flow and pass all the levels
• Feel The Game.
